info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued March 18 at 10:25PM EDT by NWS Albany
info.description: ...A BAND OF HEAVY SNOW WILL AFFECT PARTS OF SOUTHERN FULTON... HAMILTON...SCHOHARIE...NORTHERN FULTON...SOUTHERN HERKIMER...AND MONTGOMERY COUNTIES... HAZARDS...A band of heavy snow accompanied by winds of up to 35 MPH which can rapidly reduce visibility to less than one half of a mile. LOCATION AND MOVEMENT...At 1024 PM EDT, a band of heavy snow was along a line extending from near Stratford to Exeter Center and moving east at 40 MPH. THIS BAND OF HEAVY SNOW WILL BE NEAR... Caroga Lake and Caroga Lake Public Campground around 1045 PM EDT. Sharon Springs around 1055 PM EDT. Northville, Richmondville, Mayfield, Cranberry Creek and Northampton Beach Public Campground around 1105 PM EDT. Cobleskill around 1110 PM EDT. This includes the following highways... Interstate 88 between exits 20 and 21. Interstate 90 between exits 28 and 29. SAFETY INFO... Conditions can deteriorate rapidly in winter weather situations. Be prepared for snow or ice covered roads. Slow down and allow extra time to reach your destination. &&
